scripts.setup: npm install && cd playwright-tests && npm install && npx playwright install && cd ../triage-dashboard && npm install
scripts.ci: npm run enrich && npm run triage && npm run test && npm run report
scripts.ci:enrich:data: cd playwright-tests && npm run build && node dist/triage/index.js && npm run validate:data
scripts.ci:allure:generate: cd playwright-tests && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.allure: cd playwright-tests && npm run allure:generate && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.dashboard: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs -r kill -9 && cd triage-dashboard && npm start
scripts.full:demo:01: npm run enrich && npm run triage && (npm run test || true) && npm run start:reports
scripts.full:demo:02: npm run enrich && concurrently "npm run start-server" "npm run start"
scripts.full:demo:03: npm run enrich && npm run allure && npm run start
scripts.full:demo: npm run enrich && npm run clean:allure && npm run test && npm run report && lsof -ti:3000 | xargs -r kill -9 && concurrently "npm run start-server" "npm run start" "cd playwright-tests && npx allure open allure-report"
scripts.local:full:demo: npm run clean:allure && npm run enrich:data &&  npm run test && npm run report && lsof -ti:3000 | xargs -r kill -9 && concurrently "npm run start-server" "npm run start" "cd playwright-tests && npx allure open allure-report"
